resources.string: The Devcomms app is coded by the community members. Architecturally, this is built with the new Android Architecture components and Firestore. All of this is coded natively. \n\nSee the repo and read more at: ºhttps://github.com/GDLDevComms/DevComms

JDD is an annual event organized by the communities in Guadalajara dedicated to JVM languages. This event brings together the talent around Mexico and the global speaker that want to share their knowledge along with the communities. \n\nread more at ºhttps://www.facebook.com/JavaDevDay
